pages.text: $(li)Mountains are a biome located at high altitudes and they are composed mostly of Stone, Dirt and, sometimes, Snow, covering the whole area.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the Overwold.$(br)$(li)You can find some vegetation like Spruce and Oak trees and animals such as $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/yak)Yaks$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagles$(/l) here too.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Mountains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
